title: Harold Night
description:
It's Harold Night at the Push Comedy Theater!

So who the heck is Harold? More accurately the question should be... what the heck is a Harold?

The Harold is the big, bad grand daddy of all long form improv! It starts with an audience suggestion, then improvisers weave together scenes, characters and group games to create a seamless piece. It can be bizarre and magical, baffling and amazing... it definitely needs to be seen.

Harold Night

Free show!!!

The Push Comedy Theater only has 99 seats, so we recommend you get your tickets in advance.



--

The Push Comedy Theater is a 99 seat venue in the heart of Norfolk's brand new Arts District. Founded by local comedy group The Pushers, the Push Comedy Theater is dedicated to bringing you live comedy from the best local and national acts.

The Push Comedy Theater hosts live sketch, improv and stand-up comedy on Friday and Saturday nights. During the week classes are offered in stand-up, sketch and improv comedy as well as acting.

Whether you're a die-hard comedy lover or a casual fan... a seasoned performer or someone who's never stepped foot on stage... the Push Comedy Theater has something for you.

The Harold is the big, bad grand daddy of all long form improv! It starts with an audience suggestion, then improvisers weave together scenes, characters and group games to create a seamless piece. It can be bizarre and magical, baffling and amazing... it definitely needs to be seen.

Harold Night

Free show!!!

The Push Comedy Theater only has 99 seats, so we recommend you get your tickets in advance.

Whether you're a die-hard comedy lover or a casual fan... a seasoned performer or someone who's never stepped foot on stage... the Push Comedy Theater has something for you.

title: Spartacus Fartacus: An Improvised Journey Through History
description:
Let's get historical!

The pageant of history is a rich tapestry of both people and events... a journey from the then to the now.  History's importance cannot be discounted, for those who fail to acknowledge and learn from the mistakes of history shall be forever doomed to repeat them. Or some shit like that...

Spartacus Fartacus is Brad McMurran, Sean Devereux, and Ed Carden. 3 men seeking to bring history to life in the form of original improvised entertainment!

It starts with the audience suggestion of a historical event or figure, and then explodes into a great trek through the ages with only Brad, Ed, and Sean's knowledge of history (or lack thereof) as a guide.

It's like Bill and Ted's Excellent Adventure... but not as smart.

Spartacus Fartacus: An Improvised Journey Through History

Friday, February 21st at 8pm

Tickets are $8.  Every tickets comes with a hot dog.

The Push Comedy Theater only has 99 seats, so we recommend you get your tickets in advance.

title: The Made Up Movie
description:
Who needs Hollywood!

With a single audience suggestion, an entire movie is created right before your eyes.

Courageous heroes... dastardly villains... mind-blowing special effects... you'll see it all and more crammed into two 25 minutes sets of improv magic.

The Made Up Movie is a wild, crazy and energetic show, where you'll never know what's going to happen next.

Don't miss it.



The Made Up Movie

Friday, February 21st, 10pm

Tickets are $8.  Every  tickets comes with a hot dog.

The Push Comedy Theater only has 90 seats, so we recommend you get your tickets in advance.

title: Face for Radio: A Live Radio Play
description:
Faces for Radio is a comedic live radio play coming out of the Push Comedy Theater in Norfolk, VA. The show is a modern and hilarious take on Radio Shows from the 30s and 40s; think Modern Family meets the George Burns and Gracie Allen Show.



The show features the character work and vocal talents of Scot Rose and Hilary Stallings and the sound effect stylings of Lindsay Horne. With originally written wacky characters, slap-stick sound effects and old-school advertisements; Faces for Radio is sure to delight people in their 20s to those born in the 1920s. Don’t miss this unique show!



Faces for Radio: A Live Radio Play

Saturday, February 22nd at 8pm

Tickets are $10. Every tickets comes with a hot dog.

title: TOO FAR: The Dirtiest, Most Inappropriate Comedy Show... EVER!
description:
Are you ready to get dirty!?!

ComicKaze Sketch Comedy,  2019’s Outstanding Group of the Year, has been tapped by The Pushers to bring you the dirtiest, most offensive show Hampton Roads has ever seen.

It's a show we call Too Far!

WARNING: This show isn't for everyone. If you're not a fan of foul, sophomoric, potty humor... then this is not the show for you.

Join ComicKaze and friends... and let's get dirty!!!

TOO FAR: The Dirtiest, Most Inappropriate Comedy Show... EVER!
	Saturday, February 22nd

Tickets are $13. Every tickets comes with a hot dog.

Show starts at 10:00pm

------------
	ComicKaze is the stray puppy of the Push Comedy Theater. Adorable and dirty. Playful and rambunctious. Likely to pee on your floor.
	Featuring Kasey Kennedy, Austin Johnson, Alex Weller, Patrick C. Taylor, Trip Rumble, and special guests Yasmeen Freightman & Erika Guess, ComicKaze has been making sketch comedy videos for years and made their Push Comedy Theater debut with a winning set in Sketchmageddon, as well as performing at Philly Sketch Fest, Cozzy’s Comedy Club, and Virginia Beach Funny Bone.
	------------
	The Push Comedy Theater is a 90 seat venue in the heart of Norfolk's brand new Arts District. Founded by local comedy group The Pushers, the Push Comedy Theater is dedicated to bringing you live comedy from the best local and national acts.

The Push Comedy Theater hosts live sketch, improv and stand-up comedy on Friday and Saturday nights. During the week classes are offered in stand-up, sketch and improv comedy as well as acting.

title: The New Faces of Comedy with The Green Team
description:
Get ready for the next wave of comedy.



The New Faces of Comedy is a showcase for the newest, up and coming talent the Push Comedy Theater has to offer.



This month don't miss improv from The Green Team.  Get ready as The Green Team gives you a fast paced, high octane dose of Whose Line is it Anyway style improv.  The Green Team is a brand new group of fresh faced improvisers who are mentored by some great Push Comedy veterans.



Here comes the future... The Green Team.



The New Faces of Comedy with The Green Team

Last Thursday of the Month at 8pm

Tickets are $8, each ticket comes with a hot dog.

Here comes the future... The Green Team.


The New Faces of Comedy with The Green Team

title: The Improv Riot: The Short Form Improv Show
description:
Get ready for short form (Whose Line is it Anyway?) improv at the Push Comedy Theater.

You demanded it! So now it's here!!! Our very own short form improv show. All the fun of Whose Line is it Anyway... right here in Norfolk.

The Improv Riot: The Short Form Improv Show

The Last Friday of every month at 8pm

Tickets are $8. Each ticket comes with a hot dog.

The Push Comedy Theater only has 99 seats, so we recommend you get your tickets in advance.

---

The Pushers are Virginia's premiere sketch and improv comedy group. For nearly ten years they have thrilled (and shocked) audiences with their wild antics both on and off stage. The group puts on a racy, high-octane, energetic show that is guaranteed to have audiences howling with laughter. In November of 2014, they opened The Push Comedy Theater, located in the Norfolk Arts District.

In 2013 The Pushers' Off-Broadway musical Cuff Me: The Unauthorized Fifty Shades of Grey Musical Parody debuted in New York City. It ran for over a year in both New York and Chicago. A third production is currently touring the country.

The Pushers have appeared at both The Charleston Comedy Festival and The North Carolina Comedy Arts Festival. In New York, they have performed at The People's Improv Theater, The Upright Citizen's Brigade and at The Kraine Theater in New York's East Village.

Here in Hampton Roads the group have performed most notably at The Jewish Mother, The NorVa and The Virginia Beach Funnybone.

--The Push Comedy Theater is a 99 seat venue in the heart of Norfolk's brand new Arts District. Founded by local comedy group The Pushers, the Push Comedy Theater is dedicated to bringing you live comedy from the best local and national acts.

The Push Comedy Theater hosts live sketch, improv and stand-up comedy on Friday and Saturday nights. During the week classes are offered in stand-up, sketch and improv comedy as well as acting.

Whether you're a die-hard comedy lover or a casual fan... a seasoned performer or someone who's never stepped foot on stage... the Push Comedy Theater has something for you.

The Last Friday of every month at 8pm

title: The Improv Riot After Dark: The Short Form Improv Show
description:
It's your favorite short-form improv show... with a twist.

The Improv Riot After Dark takes all your fun improv games and gives them an adult spin.  Where the regular Improv Riot tries to stay PG13ish, Improv Riot After Dark will definitely be R rated.

----

Get ready for short form (Whose Line is it Anyway?) improv at the Push Comedy Theater.

You demanded it! So now it's here!!! Our very own short form improv show. All the fun of Whose Line is it Anyway... right here in Downtown Norfolk.

The Improv Riot: The Short Form Improv Show

The last Friday of every month, 10pm

Tickets are $8. Each ticket comes with a hot dog.

The Push Comedy Theater only has 99 seats, so we recommend you get your tickets in advance.

---

title: The Unusual Suspects: An Improvised Murder Mystery
description:
Who Dunnit: The Improvised Murder Mystery is now The Unusual Suspects... new name, same great show.

The hottest show in the history of the 757 is NOW A NATIONALLY TOURING SHOW!

The Unusual Suspects

There’s been a murder. Everyone is a suspect. The actors on stage. Even you.

Welcome to The Unusual Suspects, an improvised murder mystery comedy.

Throughout the night, the world’s greatest detective will interrogate a cast of unusual characters, from the wacky to the dastardly.

You’ll find yourself face to face with our notorious investigator. Could he be Sherlock, Columbo, Jessica Fletcher? Not exactly. The catch is, no one ever knows which detective will show up.

No one is above suspicion, including you and your guests.

Join us at the hit show that’s played to sold-out audiences for more than three years and counting. This isn’t your standard dinner detective fare; get ready for a wild and funny night that everyone will be talking about the next day, your family, your friends, and maybe even your priest.

The Unusual Suspects is brought to you by the writers and producers of the off-Broadway and national hit: Cuff Me: The Fifty Shades of Grey Musical Parody.

The Unusual Suspects: An Improvised Murder Mystery Comedy

The second Saturday of every month at the Push Comedy Theater

The show starts at 8pm, tickets are $15

The Push Comedy Theater only has 99 seats, so we recommend you get your tickets in advance.

---

The Push Comedy Theater is a 99 seat venue in the heart of Norfolk's brand new Arts District. Founded by local comedy group The Pushers, the Push Comedy Theater is dedicated to bringing you live comedy from the best local and national acts.

The Push Comedy Theater hosts live sketch, improv and stand-up comedy on Friday and Saturday nights. During the week classes are offered in stand-up, sketch and improv comedy as well as acting.

Whether you're a die-hard comedy lover or a casual fan... a seasoned performer or someone who's never stepped foot on stage... the Push Comedy Theater has something for you.
